reviews.review_msg: do not take any class with this prof!! plain and simple; avoid her! she asks students to 'figure it out on your own' and then marks you down b/c you didn't get it, even though you probably went to her office hours multiple times asking for help. asks you to write in a prescribed style, without accepting your personal writing differences. AWFUL!!

At first her gruffness frightened me a little, but she's super nice if you go talk to her. LOVED her sarcastic & witty little remarks in lecture. Very organized. Loved how she wasn't biased in her teaching. Fair marker. Lots of info, definitely learned things in her class. Overall, I'd take her again in a heartbeat!
